verses.verse: "Call <S%H7121><s%> now; <S%H3426><s%> is there any who will answer <S%H6030><s%> you? <S%H6918><s%> To which of the holy ones will you turn? <S%H6437><s%>
For resentment <S%H3708><s%> kills <S%H2026><s%> the foolish man, <S%H191><s%> and jealousy <S%H7068><s%> kills <S%H4191><s%> the simple. <S%H6601><s%>
I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the foolish <S%H191><s%> taking root, <S%H8327><s%> but suddenly <S%H6597><s%> I cursed <S%H5344><s%> his habitation. <S%H5116><s%>
His children <S%H1121><s%> are far <S%H7368><s%> from safety. <S%H3468><s%> They are crushed <S%H1792><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%> Neither is there any to deliver them, <S%H5337><s%>

whose harvest <S%H7105><s%> the hungry <S%H7457><s%> eats up, <S%H398><s%> and take it even out <S%H413><s%> of the thorns. <S%H6791><s%> The snare <S%H6782><s%> gapes <S%H7602><s%> for their substance. <S%H2428><s%>
For affliction <S%H205><s%> doesn't <S%H3318><s%> come forth from the dust, <S%H6083><s%> neither does trouble <S%H5999><s%> spring out <S%H6779><s%> of the ground; <S%H127><s%>
but man <S%H120><s%> is born <S%H3205><s%> to trouble, <S%H5999><s%> as the sparks <S%H1121><s%> fly <S%H5774><s%> upward. <S%H1361><s%>
"But as for me, <S%H199><s%> I would seek God. <S%H430><s%> I would commit <S%H7760><s%> my cause <S%H1700><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%>
who does <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%> that can't <S%H369><s%> be fathomed, marvelous things <S%H6381><s%> without number; <S%H4557><s%>
who gives <S%H5414><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and sends <S%H7971><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> the fields; <S%H2351><s%>
so that he sets up <S%H7760><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%> those who are low, <S%H8217><s%> those who mourn <S%H6937><s%> are exalted <S%H7682><s%> to safety. <S%H3468><s%>
He frustrates <S%H6565><s%> the devices <S%H4284><s%> of the crafty, <S%H6175><s%> So that their hands <S%H3027><s%> can't <S%H6213><s%> perform their enterprise. <S%H8454><s%>
He takes <S%H3920><s%> the wise <S%H2450><s%> in their own craftiness; <S%H6193><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the cunning <S%H6617><s%> is carried headlong. <S%H4116><s%>
They meet <S%H6298><s%> with darkness <S%H2822><s%> in the day time, <S%H3119><s%> and grope <S%H4959><s%> at noonday <S%H6672><s%> as in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
But he saves <S%H3467><s%> from the sword <S%H2719><s%> of their mouth, <S%H6310><s%> even the needy <S%H34><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty. <S%H2389><s%>
So the poor <S%H1800><s%> has hope, <S%H8615><s%> and injustice <S%H5766><s%> shuts <S%H7092><s%> her mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
"Behold, <S%H835><s%> happy is the man <S%H582><s%> whom God <S%H433><s%> corrects. <S%H3198><s%> Therefore do not despise <S%H3988><s%> the chastening <S%H4148><s%> of the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
For he wounds, <S%H3510><s%> and binds up. <S%H2280><s%> He injures, <S%H4272><s%> and his hands <S%H3027><s%> make whole. <S%H7495><s%>
He will deliver <S%H5337><s%> you in six <S%H8337><s%> troubles; <S%H6869><s%> yes, <S%H7651><s%> in seven no evil <S%H7451><s%> shall touch you. <S%H5060><s%>
In famine <S%H7458><s%> he will redeem <S%H6299><s%> you from death; <S%H4194><s%> in war, <S%H4421><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the sword. <S%H2719><s%>
You shall be hidden <S%H2244><s%> from the scourge <S%H7752><s%> of the tongue, <S%H3956><s%> neither shall you be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of destruction <S%H7701><s%> when it comes. <S%H935><s%>
At destruction <S%H7701><s%> and famine <S%H3720><s%> you shall laugh, <S%H7832><s%> neither shall you be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
For you shall be allied <S%H1285><s%> with the stones <S%H68><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%> The animals <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be at peace with you. <S%H7999><s%>
You shall know <S%H3045><s%> that your tent <S%H168><s%> is in peace. <S%H7965><s%> You shall visit <S%H6485><s%> your fold, <S%H5116><s%> and shall miss nothing. <S%H2398><s%>
You shall know <S%H3045><s%> also that your seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be great, <S%H7227><s%> Your offspring <S%H6631><s%> as the grass <S%H6212><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
You shall come <S%H935><s%> to your grave <S%H6913><s%> in a full age, <S%H3624><s%> like a shock of grain <S%H1430><s%> comes in <S%H5927><s%> its season. <S%H6256><s%>
Look this, <S%H2713><s%> we have searched it, <S%H8085><s%> so it is. Hear it, <S%H3045><s%> and know it for your good."
